title: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945 - Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. Search for references to this field.
OB: When searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the external jar, the search results are not being selected.
EB: You should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir() when searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the external jar.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar).
2. Open java.io.File.
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
4. Perform a search for references to this field.
